item.title: A few issues with my minigame
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

if (c.myShopId == 55) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId) + ": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Tier Points."); return; if (c.myShopId == 56) {
Your parenthesis ("{" and "}") should be paired. You have a "{" but no "}" after each return; or at the end of the code you posted.

Read full topic

item.title: A few issues with my minigame
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Well i’m trying to make “Tier Points” for my server and I added this…

if (c.myShopId == 55) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId) + ": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Tier Points."); return; if (c.myShopId == 56) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId) + ": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Tier Points."); return; if (c.myShopId == 57) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId) + ": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Tier Points."); return;

And got this issue

src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:188: ')' expected if (c.myShopId == 56 ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:212: illegal start of expression public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:212: ';' expected public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:212: ';' expected public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:555: illegal start of expression public void sellToShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:555: illegal start of expression public void sellToShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:555: ';' expected public void sellToShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:555: <identifier> expected public void sellToShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:555: not a statement public void sellToShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:555: ';' expected public void sellToShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:595: illegal start of expression public boolean sellItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:595: ';' expected public boolean sellItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:595: <identifier> expected public boolean sellItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:595: not a statement public boolean sellItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:595: ';' expected public boolean sellItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:595: ';' expected public boolean sellItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:665: illegal start of expression public boolean addShopItem(int itemID, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:665: ';' expected public boolean addShopItem(int itemID, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:665: <identifier> expected public boolean addShopItem(int itemID, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:665: not a statement public boolean addShopItem(int itemID, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:665: ';' expected public boolean addShopItem(int itemID, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:692: illegal start of expression public long buyDelay; ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:694: illegal start of expression public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:694: ';' expected public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:694: <identifier> expected public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:694: not a statement public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:694: ';' expected public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:694: ';' expected public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:931: illegal start of expression public void handleOtherShop(int itemID) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:931: illegal start of expression public void handleOtherShop(int itemID) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:931: ';' expected public void handleOtherShop(int itemID) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:931: ';' expected public void handleOtherShop(int itemID) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:986: illegal start of expression public void openSkillCape() { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:986: illegal start of expression public void openSkillCape() { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:986: ';' expected public void openSkillCape() { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1007: illegal start of expression public int[] skillCapes = { 9747, 9753, 9750, 9768, 9756, 9759, 9762, 98 01, ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1011: illegal start of expression public int get99Count() { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1011: ';' expected public int get99Count() { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1021: illegal start of expression public void setupSkillCapes(int capes, int capes2) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1021: illegal start of expression public void setupSkillCapes(int capes, int capes2) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1021: ';' expected public void setupSkillCapes(int capes, int capes2) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1021: <identifier> expected public void setupSkillCapes(int capes, int capes2) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1021: not a statement public void setupSkillCapes(int capes, int capes2) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1021: ';' expected public void setupSkillCapes(int capes, int capes2) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1063: illegal start of expression public void skillBuy(int item) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1063: illegal start of expression public void skillBuy(int item) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1063: ';' expected public void skillBuy(int item) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1063: ';' expected public void skillBuy(int item) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1106: illegal start of expression public void openVoid() { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1106: illegal start of expression public void openVoid() { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1106: ';' expected public void openVoid() { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1122: illegal start of expression public void buyVoid(int item) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1122: illegal start of expression public void buyVoid(int item) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1122: ';' expected public void buyVoid(int item) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1122: ';' expected public void buyVoid(int item) { ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:1139: reached end of file while parsin g }→ ^ 56 errors Press any key to continue . . .

And I added this also in shop assistant

} else if (c.myShopId == 55) { if (c.randomPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.randomPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); ShopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; ShopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > ShopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { ShopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Tier Points."); break; } } else if (c.myShopId == 56) { if (c.randomPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.randomPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); ShopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; ShopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > ShopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { ShopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Tier Points."); break; } } else if (c.myShopId == 57) { if (c.randomPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.randomPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); ShopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; ShopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > ShopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { ShopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Tier Points."); break;

Then I needed to make a shop so I added this in actionhandler…

case 36: c.getShops().openShop(55); c.sendMessage("Keep killing the forgotten warrior for higher tier points!"); c.sendMessage("You have "+c.randomPoints+ " Tier points!"); case 37: c.getShops().openShop(56); c.sendMessage("Keep killing the forgotten warrior for higher tier points!"); c.sendMessage("You have "+c.randomPoints+ " Tier points!"); case 577: c.getShops().openShop(57); c.sendMessage("Keep killing the forgotten warrior for higher tier points!"); c.sendMessage("You have "+c.randomPoints+ " Tier points!"); break;

And the in shops.cfg

shop = 55 Tier1_Store 2 2 16691 10 17239 10 16669 10 16273 10 16339 10 16935 10 16383 10 16693 10 17241 10 16671 10 16275 10 16341 10 16937 10 16385 10 16695 10 17243 10 16673 10 16277 10 16343 10 16393 10 16387 10 16697 10 17245 10 16675 10 16279 10 16345 10 16941 10 16389 10 shop = 56 Tier2_Store 2 2 16699 10 17247 10 16677 10 16281 10 16347 10 16943 10 16391 10 16701 10 17249 10 16679 10 16283 10 16349 10 16945 10 16393 10 16703 10 17251 10 16681 10 16285 10 16351 10 16947 10 16395 10 16705 10 17253 10 16683 10 16287 10 16353 10 16949 10 16397 10 shop = 57 Tier3_Store 2 2 16705 10 17253 10 16683 10 16287 10 16353 10 16949 10 16397 10 16707 10 17255 10 16685 10 16289 10 16355 10 16951 10 16399 10 16709 10 17257 10 16687 10 16291 10 16357 10 16953 10 16401 10 16711 10 17259 10 16689 10 16293 10 16359 10 16955 10 16403 10

But all the npcs still have the same shop.

Read full topic
